guides.title: NZ Birds Online
guides.summary: Bird guide with photos and sounds to help with identifications.

guides.title: Bird Sounds NZ
guides.summary: Listen to the bird sounds of New Zealand.

guides.title: Guide to New Zealand Soil Invertebrates
guides.summary: Multiple guides on critters that live in the soil; insects, snails, worms, millipedes, centipedes etc.

guides.title: What is this bug?
guides.summary: A interactive website to help you identify bugs by inputing characteristics.

guides.title: Stinkbugs
guides.summary: Website to help id stink bugs/Pentatomidae of NZ

guides.title: A Photographic Guide to Freshwater Invertebrates of Taranaki's Rivers and Streams
guides.summary: Document with photos; includes things like mayfiles, damselfiles, worms, snails, files.

guides.title: Freshwater invertebrates guide
guides.summary: Interactive website that asks questions to lead to an id.

guides.title: New Zealand Butterfly Identification Guide
guides.summary: A website with pictures to help identify butterflies.

guides.title: Bumblebee distribution
guides.summary: Identification patterns of bumblebees and their distribution through NZ.

guides.title: Footprint Project
guides.summary: A collection of observations of animal footprints/sign.

guides.title: NZ Tracker
guides.summary: Helps with the identifications of animal sign (mostly footprints).

guides.title: Pest Detective
guides.summary: An interactive online field guide to help people in New Zealand identify the presence of pest animal species.

guides.title: Tracking Tunnel Footprint Guide
guides.summary: A short guide for identifying footprints on tracking tunnel papers.

guides.title: New Zealand Fishes Volume 1
guides.summary: A field guide to common species caught by bottom and midwater fishing.

guides.title: New Zealand Fishes Volume 2
guides.summary: A field guide to less common species caught by bottom and midwater fishing.

guides.title: New Zealand Fishes Volume 3
guides.summary: A field guide to common species caught by surface fishing.

guides.title: Tripterygiid Fishes of Australia, New Zealand and the Southwest Pacific Ocean
guides.summary: A PDF detailing the different triplefins of NZ.

guides.title: What's My Crab
guides.summary: Interactive crab guide to help with identification.

guides.title: Various NIWA guides
guides.summary: A range of guides including: Sea anemones, sea squirts, sea weeds, barnacles, bryozoans, crabs, sea starts, brittle stars, sea cucumbers, jellyfish, sponges, sea slugs.

guides.title: Brachyura and Crab-like Anomura of New Zealand
guides.summary: PDFs with detailed descriptions of crabs.

guides.title: The Marine Fauna of New Zealand: Family Hymenosomatidae
guides.summary: PDF with details of Family Hymenosomatidae crabs.

guides.title: Marine Egss Project
guides.summary: A collection of observations of marine eggs.

guides.title: New Zealand Mollusca
guides.summary: An interactive shell guide - identify commonly encountered species by shape and form.

guides.title: Black Sea Snail Field Guide
guides.summary: A field guide for black sea snails (dilomas and others).

guides.title: NZ Shells
guides.summary: Pictures of NZ shells.

guides.title: Guides to the ferns and lycophytes of New Zealand
guides.summary: A collection of guides to help identify New Zealand's ferns and lycophytes.
